Class gjt.Util 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----gjt.Util
public class Util
extends Object
A handy collection of methods for getting a component's frame, getting a component's applet, waiting for a component's image, and wallpapering a components background.

Util()

getApplet(Component)
getDialog(Component)
getFrame(Component)
setCursor(int, Component)
stretchImage(Component, Graphics, Image)
waitForImage(Component, Image)
wallPaper(Component, Graphics, Image)

Util 
 public Util()

                                 Image image)
wallPaper

                              Graphics g,
                              Image image)

                                 Graphics g,
                                 Image image)
